# üéâ New feature

## Summary
Adds transparent mode to debug models. This is done by setting the transparency value of the material of the target visual.
![transparent_ mode](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39728574/123110838-13d7ff80-d45a-11eb-9e2e-1ce427d5002e.gif)

Ogre1 doesn't seem to work for me (along with Align Tool's transparent mode). Can someone confirm?
![transparent_mode_ogre1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39728574/123111454-8ea11a80-d45a-11eb-9951-7907f12e8b0e.gif)

## Test it
Test it by selecting an entity and `View -> Transparent`

Closes #106 
Requires https://github.com/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull/366

## Summary
Adds the ability to visualize joints of simulation models, similar to Gazebo Classic
![visualize_joints](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39728574/128728837-41c6613f-5490-42db-85e5-b3e175cf28db.gif)


## Test it
Test it by right-clicking on a model and selecting `View -> Joints`
